title: Out of all the the ADCs....
body:
Varus is the only one who has remained fairly well balanced.

he is the epitome of what an adc should be.

he has damage steroids that scale as the game goes on, he can be quite strong, but is punished for poor positioning.

he is immobile, but brings a lot to a team if he gets going.

he can outplay or be outplayed.

he has never been insanely OP or complete trash. (from what I remember)

every other ADC has  seen really big upswings and downswings in play/win rate, but Varus remains fairly stable

i suggest we rework every ADC into Varus, so that ADCs are no longer an issue :^)
